definition: "speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]

sentences.english: It is great to change foe to friend.
sentences.chinese: 把仇雠变为朋友，这该多好啊。

sentences.english: From collection to collation, they did a great deal of painstaking and careful job of proofreading and correcting.
sentences.chinese: 从搜集到整理书籍，他们作了大量细致的校雠工作。

sentences.english: For it is the day of the vengeance of the Lord, the year of recompenses of the judgment of Sion.
sentences.chinese: 因为这是上主复雠的日子，是为报复熙雍敌人的一年。

sentences.english: The editors are collating the contributions.
sentences.chinese: 编辑们在对稿件进行校雠。

definition: see 徘徊[pai2 huai2], to dither/to hesitate/to pace back and forth/irresolute
to give in to/to be swayed by (personal considerations etc)/Taiwan pr. [xun2]/to follow/to expose publicly/variant of 侚[xun4]/variant of 殉[xun4]
time of famine or crop failure
variant of 眷[juan4]/to care about/to look fondly on
to amputate one or both feet (punishment in imperial China)/see also 五刑[wu3 xing2]
